Policies & Documents

Important information for all members and participants

Important Documents

Please review these important policies and documents. All participants and their families should be familiar with our guidelines and procedures.

Important Information

Safety First

All participants must follow our safety guidelines. Please review our safety policies and ensure you understand the rules before participating in any activities.

Membership Terms

Our membership terms outline the rights and responsibilities of all members. Please review these carefully before signing up for classes or programs.

Privacy Policy

We are committed to protecting your privacy. Our privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

Refund Policy

Please review our refund and cancellation policies before making any payments. These policies apply to all programs and services.

Questions About Our Policies?

If you have any questions about our policies or need clarification on any terms, please don't hesitate to contact us.
